segments.speaker: Jordan
segments.text: Oh, no go ahead! It's all yours.

segments.speaker: Alex
segments.text: Thanks! I'm Alex by the way. This place has the best lattes.

segments.speaker: Jordan
segments.text: I'm Jordan! Yeah I come here all the time - what's your go-to order?

segments.speaker: Alex
segments.text: Oat milk latte with an extra shot. I'm kind of a coffee snob, honestly.

segments.speaker: Jordan
segments.text: Ha! Same here. Have you tried the new seasonal one? I've been meaning to but I always chicken out and get my usual.

segments.speaker: Alex
segments.text: I haven't but now I'm curious. Maybe I'll try it next time. Do you work nearby?

segments.speaker: Jordan
segments.text: Yeah, just around the corner actually. It's nice having this place so close. What about you - do you live around here?

segments.speaker: Alex
segments.text: About ten minutes away. Hey, I don't want to keep you if you're busy, but would you want to grab coffee together sometime? Like, intentionally?

segments.speaker: Jordan
segments.text: I'd really like that actually! Here, let me give you my number.
